It's fun with friends, but don't buy it if you're easily stressed our quick to anger. The game has one of the most toxic communities on the market, and your enemy WILL go out of their way to ruin the game for you, both as survivor and killer. Recommend buying it from a third party like G2A or cdkeys.com, or if it's 75% sale here. Do not buy it at full price, and do not expect to have fun without spending a lot more money on the DLC just to unlock the perks you need.

DBD makes you love the characters (killers & survivors) b/c of their lore, cosmetics, & perks. Also, this game might make you love the horror genre and maybe curious to watch horror movies some of the license killers came from. Fun game to play with a swf (survive with friends) team and making you become motivated to escape a trial from a killer after being sacrificed to the entity many times.
Pros: fun with friends, the devs always updates the game, new killers and survivors are released, creating different perk builds, some cosmetics are worth a buck to purchase, memes, funny moments such as teabagging ghosties, & some players such as ttvs (Twitch streamers) are very friendly.
Cons: solo que survivors can be challenging for some players, players will purposely dc (disconnect) in a match 'cause of a killer they do not like and/or the match is boring. too many pallets right next to each other and following it up with a vaulting window in front, next to, and behind pallets, & entitled, toxic, and salty players such as saying very rude things in the post-game chat might make you deter away from playing.

這是一個溫馨感人的遊戲

-

今天這局，三個小夥伴全掛了，剩我一個人，我躲起來裝死，被鬼找到後，掙脫著到處跑，想找到最後的出口，但我從沒找到過，其實隱約感覺到最後那道出口的聲音離我不遠，但我就是找不到。 

 

鬼又抓到我，我繼續掙扎，繼續亂跑，然後又被逮到。 

 

鬼帶著我走啊走，然後我從他肩膀上看到了那個傳說中的地道，最後的出口，玩這鬼抓人遊戲快一星期，我第一次看到真正的地道，還在感慨"原來我剛才離它還蠻近的" 

一邊覺得"沒關係，我也沒有遺憾了..." 

 

突然，鬼把我從肩膀放下 

 

我問號，然後我爬近那個地道，成功逃出。 

 

當下真的很感動，但我不太明白為什麼他要這麼做，是真的看我跑來跑去太可憐了嗎XD 

 

然後我開始當鬼 

 

突然一場壯大運，碰到主場，不知不覺已經抓了三個人上天，剩最後一個，當時我沒有想太多，突然，我走著走著，地道就出現在我腳下，這是我第一次找到地道，我好開心，想分享我的喜悅，我想跟最後那個人說:你快來，我幫你找到了! 

 

 

但我就拿著槌子站在出口旁，最後一個人不會靠近也是很合理，我又不希望它自己找到，因為那樣他不會知道我想跟他分享的喜悅。我決定把剩下的那個人抓過來，像剛才一樣。 

 

我邊守邊等，等了10多分鐘，終於成功把他打倒了(我知道聽起來不合理) 

 

我把他扛起來，帶到地道旁放下 

 

我覺得這一刻他會感受到我想表達的： 

 

我當鬼當的很開心 

你撐到最後辛苦你了 

謝謝你陪我玩。 

 

當然因為無法溝通， 

誰也不知道彼此真正想的是什麼， 

但我希望他能感受到。 

 

同時我發現，就跟那個放我走的人一樣， 

當自身有權利決定他人的去留， 

在友善的互動過後，握有選擇的人決定放手 

對我來說，那是非常溫馨友善的時刻。 

 

這只是個小小的、虛無的遊戲 

但我感觸很深。 

 

#當然前提是整個遊戲過程中互動都是友好的 
#卡我鉤子的人真的有夠討厭
#我也不是高手好不容易抓到人讓我高興一下不行嗎
#我才剛開始玩邁克爾我容易嗎
#抓到人守一下下很合理吧XDD

A really interesting game with a lot of variety and content. Definitely worth buying for people who just want to try something new. Before you think about a purchase, however, you should be aware of what kind of community this game has. There is no way to please people. The developers have done a lot of shit but they've been trying hard for some time now and there's only negative things coming from the community. "Uhh the nerf from the Survivor Perks was shit" "Uhh I have to learn a new meta" "No, I don't play that anymore Killer/Survivor is way too OP right now" Often this criticism is wrong, many people are not able Investigating problems or to verify that they exist. Often there is no constructive criticism wich makes it very difficult for the developers to connect to the community and understand problems. Of course this is not always the case, there are many people who are really trying to improve the game. Nevertheless, negative, groundless and annoying screaming is always there. I hope that if you decide to buy it, you won't let this negative review influence you too much, there are a lot of changes going on right now and you have to be open to something new after each and every patch, not everyone is able to do that. I hope that as a future player, even with the greatest anger, you can still have fun with this game, respect the developers and your fellow human beings and, despite everything, connect with this great burning garbage can of a community.

La base du jeu est superbe, j'adore le gameplay en lui même, le faite de devoir brain l'équipe adverse et son ambiance globale in-game. Malheureusement toute est gaché à cause du faite que les parties se jouent énormément sur le es-ce que le tueur va être cancer ou non. Et bien évidemment le 95% des tueurs sur lequels je tombe campent pendant toute la game se qui rend le jeu injouable et juste pas fun. Pourtant j'ai essayé les perks qui sont "censés" empêcher le tueur de camper mais ça ne change rien du tout. J'ai tenté de jouer avec des amis aussi mais ils sont vite parti ne comprenant pas l'intérêt de jouer dans ces conditions. Nous n'y avons pas assez joué peut-être. Mais s'il faut 500h de jeux pour commencer à apprécier le jeu ça sera sans moi.

The recent patch made the game unbearable for solo queue players, which shows that the developers are clearly neglecting solo queue, which is the most vulnerable group to balance changes for.

The matchmaking is horrible, despite of months of work put into it. 

Most of the more popular perks were mutilated, instead of buffing the less used perks to their level.

The developers are not able to provide adequate solutions to overall balance the game, for example providing casual and competitive mode and queues.

There is still no custom practice mode with bots, although "hackers" were able to implement scripts for bots, which can be found in public games, and work like they could in practice games. 

I am very disappointed, because I really loved this game, but until they manage to change the game to something better, I will not play it anymore.
